runs.comm: half-volley, driven nicely past cover, the batsmen think they have got four runs, but the ball slows up, and they jog through for two. Pathan wasn't even running to begin with. Will India regret this missed run in a last-ball finish?
short of a length, cut away, but can't beat point
this one is darted in, hits the inside edge on the way to the pad
too full and high again, and he has square-driven this between cover and cover-point. There's no stopping this one, though
full, on the pads, worked away to deep midwicket
full, on the pads, turns a little, beats a half-sweep, concedes a leg-bye
length ball, angling in, pushed into the leg side for one
length ball again, on the pads, worked away
length ball, angling in towards top of off, punched to mid-off
short, skiddy, beats him for pace on the pull, but Pathan gets a leg-bye
short, wide enough, and he has steered this past point. Just guided past the man. Lovely timing
another short and wide delivery, but this time it bounces a little extra and he finds the man at point
length ball, outside off, push-driven wide of mid-off
and he angles it in too far with the fine leg up in the circle. Deftly glanced away by Gambhir. Minimum effort, four runs for the taking
more accurate now, on a length, middle and off, defended
short of a length, punched away nicely, but can't beat point
dug it in, Gambhir backed away to steer it past point from outside leg

great footwork from Cummins. Short of a length, gets a little big on him, he drops it just off the pitch and runs. On most occasions these result in singles, but Cummins has other ideas here. he strides towards the ball, and kicks it towards the stump, dislodging the bails a second before Gambhir's bat has slid in. Top work from Cummins
pitched up, middle and leg, flicked away to deep square leg
and he really can't do anything wrong. A decent delivery, short of a length, outside off, and he has punched it to the right of third man for four
short of a length, on the pads, worked away for one
pulled away off the front foot, gets a single to deep square leg
pulled away, wide of mid-on, but Hogg makes a diving save. Australia on with their fielding game
full, on the pads, flicked away, Hogg makes another diving save, but can't prevent the single
short of a length, middle and leg, worked away for one
allrounder to allrounder, Watson will not be pleased. Length ball, outside off, and Pathan has lofted him right over his head. An evidence of the batting talent
drops this into the leg side, finds short midwicket
full, on the pads, flicked away for a single
short of a length, into the pads, worked away for an easy single
top shot from Pathan again. Jumps out of the crease, makes room too, takes a length ball from off and lofts it over point. That's a difficult shot to play
dabbed away to third man for one
dragged from outside off, gets a single to mid-on
push-driven wide of mid-off for one
Pathan gives him the charge, he bowls the slower ball, Pathan guides it fine on the leg side, Watson makes a diving save at short fine leg
Kohli on the charge now, gets a wide length ball, drives it inside-out, past the desperate diving hand at extra cover
late-cuts this short ball, but can't get it past point
stars off with a big wide down the leg side, but Pathan sees an easy four for himself and guides this between the keeper and short fine leg
gets the length and line better, on a length, middle and leg, turning away, worked into the leg side for one
bowls a long hop, and has been pulled to deep midwicket
huge shout for lbw short delivery, skids on, pitches leg, but doesn't straighten enough
another shout, this one doesn't turn, though, and is sliding down leg. Pathan is playing for the turn, but is not quite getting it here, and has twice come close to being given out lbw
tossed up, this turns after pitching outside leg, beating his sweep. He won't even get a leg-bye here
that's good pace. Short of a length, 142ks, getting to to bounce towards the chest, hits the top of the bat

pace has done him in. This is one of the rare instances in recent times that Kohli has been done in comprehensively by a bowler. It's the pace and bounce again. Short, close to 143ks, his weight didn't go back as he pulled, and ended up skying it towards mid-off. Christian had to run to to his right, and put a slide in to complete the catch
full, on off, goes off the outer half of the bat, a misfield from Warner at point costs them two runs

it's the bouncer again, but Pathan's mis-hit doesn't carry to deep midwicket. Top effort from Starc, though. A bit too quick for Pathan, but it never looks like carrying. Starc charges in, though, puts a full-length dive in, but reaches it on the half-volley
bouncer again, healthy pace too, good over so far. Yuvraj sways out of the line here
tucked away off the hip for a single
googly, too short, though, punched away, but in the air, and it falls just short of short extra cover
full now, driven to short extra cover again

looked like a googly, but it didn't even land. The leg-side full toss has been smashed wide of long-on where Christian tried to do too much with it. He dived and also tried to lob it up for a relay throw, but failed to collect it first
accurate length ball, no turn, defended back to him
short of a length, quicker delivery, goes deep into the crease to get a single to long-on
flighted generously, almost a yorker, dug out for a single to the right of short extra cover
driven to long-on for one
worked away off the pads
looks for a vertical-bat pull, is beaten by the pace off the pitch
Pathan charges at him, mis-hits, which is just as well because it doesn't carry to long-on
driven to long-on for a single
appeal for lbw as this short ball skids and stays low, but it is also headed down leg side
Bouncer is back. Hello. And so is Watson's golden arm. Digs this in, Yuvraj likes the drop in pace from Cummins, and he top-edges it to deep midwicket
another mis-hit from Pathan, and it is safe again. Short from Watson, looks to pull it, gets a bottom edge past the keeper
length ball, on the pads, worked away, but not through the infield
pulled away to deep square leg for one
length ball, on off, plays with an open face, gets a single between cover and point

Watson strikes again. India might even be thankful that Pathan is out. Memories of Ravindra Jadeja's promotion all those years ago when he tried his best to hit out but just couldn't. This is full, on the pads, flicked away, straight to short midwicket

played all around it. Wide of the crease, slightly low arm, angled in towards top of off, Sharma just misses the line completely, the bat coming down from slips, but looking to play straight. The off stump goes for a walk. Australia on a hat-trick
length ball outside off, left alone
driven away on the up, and the sweeper-cover does really well with the bad bounce on this patchy outfield
length ball, on off, pushed to short cover
short, outside off, steered away, and third man keeps them down to one with a dive
Watson is everywhere. Wide length ball, Dhoni throws his hands at it, gets a thick edge past slip, third man is wide, but Watson does really well with a desperate dive to save two runs
bowls a googly, Raina doesn't read it, recovers decently to get it into the leg side for one
googly again, Dhoni reads it off the pitch, cuts it in front of square, but can;t beat straight extra cover
pitches middle, turns in sharply, past leg, called a wide, Hogg is not happy
they are not picking the googly. Tossed up on off, Dhoni throws his hands at it, gets a thick edge, past slip. Gets four for it too
flighted on off, defended off the front foot
driven to long-off for one
flighted on off, turning away, defends, goes off the thick edge, but safe
length ball, on off, pushed down the ground, the mid-off is up
short, chest high, 129ks, Dhoni pulls this emphatically, along the ground, between deep midwicket and deep square
short of a length, outside off, left alone
steered away to third man for one
length ball, on off, bunted into the leg side for one
length ball, on off, pushed to straightish extra cover
misfielded. That's a little embarrassing by Aussie standards. Driven back at him, and through Hogg's legs. Straight through them. Warner puts in a desperate dive at long-off, but can't keep it in
Raina reads this googly off the pitch, guides it into the leg side for one
Dhoni plays a the cut, in front of square, can't beat extra cover
that's a bad delivery. Length ball, on leg, turning sharply in, for five wides
no clue about that googly. Pitched on leg again, he plays for the turn, and is beaten comprehensively by the away turn
no clue about the googly again, and even though is short, all he manages is an edge to point
and he ends it with another unread googly, which squares Dhoni up in defence. Good comeback from those five wides
short of a length, steered away to third man for one
length ball, headed towards top of off, pushed to cover
slower bouncer, Dhoni waits and waits, and pulls it well for two. Well doe to Hogg, too, who charges to his right from fine leg, puts in a dive, keeps the ball in play
cramped up for room, punched straight to straight extra cover
another dot. Short of a length, quick, on off, no room, pushed back to him

pressure of dot balls there. This is a wide half-volley, might even have been called wide had he not driven at it. No feet means he is reaching out, and manages just a limp hit straight to extra cover
poor delivery at death. Length ball, 127ks, on leg, Raina punches it back over his head. Lands inches inside the boundary cushion. High elbow held for cameras
short and wide now, cut away to deep point
wide length all, he slashes at it and missed. Lucky to get away with it
Christian got away with it last ball, but you can't afford bowling wide length balls at death. Ashwin opens the face, drives it square, between cover-point and point
wide half-volley, driven to long-off
full, on off, driven to long-off for one
bloody good yorker. Is Wasim Akram watching and approving of it? Swinging in, on off, dug out, but back to Starc
short and wide, gets away with it. Toe-ended to to the left of sweeper-cover, but with Ashwin there is no danger of conceding the second
never mind the seconds, take this six from Ashwin. He ,may not run, he can hit the ball. Bouncer, at 140ks, and he has pulled this well over midwicket
gives him the charge, misses as he drives at a short-of-a-length delivery
Hogg could have caught this. Helped away off the hip, in the air, towards fine leg, Hogg gets around it, but doesn't run in at all. It lands on a half-volley for him
another charge, swing and miss. This one held its line just outside off
slower bouncer, Raina pulls it, top edge lands safe
walks right across the stumps and misses a plum full toss. Ashwin wants a no-ball for height, but the umpire doesn't oblige
slower ball, slogged away, along the ground, gets a single
slower short ball, Raina connects thin air with his wild heave, they take a bye, Wade lobs the throw too far, and then Hogg fails to back up well at mid-off, allowing them a second
slower bouncer again, pulled away to deep midwicket
wide and full, Ashwin charges down, and misses by about a foot. No bye this time
slower ball gone wrong, and he has smacked this full toss into the cow corner. Warner puts a dive in, but cant touch it
poor bowling. Fine leg is up, and he is full and on the pads. Raina takes the gifted runs

Raina falls in search for quick runs. Wide length ball, he gets under it, but can't clear long-off. Watson hasn't bowled the best of overs, but with this wicket he has a chance to pull it all back. Decent hand from Raina, though
looks to walks across, Watson bowls a wide full delivery, Ashwin gets a thick edge to third man
full toss, absolutely smashed, but for a single to long-on
shuffles across again, Watson has enough time to realise that and bowls full and wide, and Ashwin gets just the single to cover
